examples.en: The biceps are the muscles in the front of the upper arm.
examples.zh: 二头肌是上臂前面的肌肉。

examples.en: I went to the gym to work out my muscles.
She muscled her way through the crowd.
The athlete had muscled his way to victory.
examples.zh: 运动员通过努力赢得了胜利。

examples.en: After muscled training, he felt stronger.
examples.zh: 经过锻炼后，他感觉更强壮了。
